::Perndabot/Chordate::

Perndabot nods, putting away his gun. Gunfire would probably be detected by 
the scanners, and that wouldn't be good news. He begins to walk through the 
door, spinning around as he hears a bot run into the room.

Chordate swears as he sees Rex on the ground, turning on the sprinklers with 
a silent command. Seeing Perndabot outlined against the water, he opens fire, 
hitting the bigger bot in the chest.
